Submission Guidelines**
=====================

For information on how to submit a tender or proposal, please refer to the [Procurement Centre of Excellence](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/app-acquisition) website. If you are an Aboriginal business looking to participate in the Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB), please visit the official website for more information.

Contact Kristen Bell-Lalonde at [kristen.bell-lalonde@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristen.bell-lalonde@tpsg
